sn35.61:1.4: Cakkhunca paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam. Tinnam sangati phasso.
sn35.61:1.6: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvinnanepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, vedanayapi nibbindati.
sn35.61:1.7: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimokkha ‘pariyadinnam me upadanan’ti pajanati …pe…
sn35.61:1.8: jivhanca paticca rase ca uppajjati jivhavinnanam …pe…
sn35.61:1.9: mananca paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam. Tinnam sangati phasso.
sn35.61:1.11: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manovinnanepi nibbindati manosamphassepi nibbindati, vedanayapi nibbindati.
sn35.61:1.12: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimokkha ‘pariyadinnam me upadanan’ti pajanati.
